definition: Xinhui county and district of Jiangmen city 江門市|江门市, Guangdong
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
new/newly/meso- (chemistry)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: An understanding heart gives you empathy and compassion for others.
sentences.chinese: 一個有理性的新會給你情感和憐憫之心。

sentences.english: The club applied the rules to new members only.
sentences.chinese: 俱樂部僅對新會員實行這些規定。

sentences.english: New member sign-ups were slowing down as well.
sentences.chinese: 新會員註冊增長也在放慢。

sentences.english: My feet still ached from the morning orientation and the tour of the school.
sentences.chinese: 經過早上的迎新會和校園參觀，腳也開始隱隱作痛。

sentences.english: Their club has recently admitted a few new members.
sentences.chinese: 他們俱樂部最近吸收了幾位新會員。

sentences.english: The fraternity may bid four new men.
sentences.chinese: 這個互助會可接納4名新會員。

sentences.english: The plan to support new charter clubs and to rescue those weak clubs.
sentences.chinese: 支援創立新會與救援待拯救分會。

sentences.english: We are pleased to welcome in several new members this year.
sentences.chinese: 我們高興地歡迎今年的幾位新會員。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the difference of the volatile of Pericarpium Citri Reticulatae between Xinhui and other areas.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討新會陳皮與其他地區陳皮揮發油成分的差異。

sentences.english: The presentation was held in the Kennedy Auditorium.
sentences.chinese: 這次迎新會在肯尼迪禮堂舉行。

sentences.english: Send goodbye message to members when they are unsubscribed?
sentences.chinese: 當有新會員加入時，是否寄發歡迎信？

sentences.english: They actively recruit new affiliates to their program.
sentences.chinese: 他們積極爲他們的項目招收新會員。

sentences.english: Our football fan club began to recruit new members last week.
sentences.chinese: 我們的足球球迷俱樂部上週開始招收新會員。

sentences.english: Shall be responsible for welcoming new students and recruiting new members.
sentences.chinese: 負責接待新生及召募新會員。

sentences.english: How would you conduct a membership-building contest in your club?
sentences.chinese: 貴會將如何舉辦新會員招募競賽呢？
